description: This is a React component file implementing a Todo List web application. It manages state for todos, filtering, and search, and renders UI elements for interacting with the todo items.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with specified text, generating a unique ID and timestamp.

methods.name: toggleTodo
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a todo item identified by ID.

methods.name: editTodo
methods.description: Edits the text of an existing todo identified by ID.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo item by ID.
